title: “Sanctioned or Approved Plan” means the set of plans in connection with a development which are duly approved and sanctioned by the Planning Authority
clause_text: “Sanctioned or Approved Plan” means the set of plans in connection with a development which are duly approved and sanctioned by the Planning Authority. "Service road" means a road/lane provided at the front, rear or side of a plot for service purposes. "Site/Plot" means a parcel or piece of land enclosed by definite boundaries. "Site, Corner" means a site at the junction of land fronting on two or more roads or streets. "Site, Depth of” means the mean horizontal distance between the front and rear site boundaries. "Site with double frontage" means a site having a frontage on two streets other than a corner plot.

source_pdf.text_snippet: “Sanctioned or Approved Plan” means the set of plans in connection with a development which are duly approved and sanctioned by the Planning Authority.
